bug.short_desc: Add possibility to reuse doc comment from another method

long_desc.thetext:
Sometimes when you are just delegating to another method (of the same or another object), so literally an one line method body, it would be nice to *not* copy and paste the entire doc comment from somewhere else but say "use the whole doc comment from qx.a.b.c#foo or #foo (same class) because this is actually just an alias".
The doc comment could then be "expanded" in the API viewer - don't know if it makes sense to add a note that this doc comment is originally from somewhere else.
The "api-verify" job should also warn you if the doc comment from somewhere else is *not* matching your own method signature.
Maybe there is a similar open bug elsewhere but I haven't found it. :(
